Articles.Content:
Alright so I wanted to try out BD Armory. I installed BD Armory plus for 1.12.3 and i have all the parts, but I can't place anything but armor and a gun rack. So i cant use it because I can't place rockets or a weapon manager it just flickers. I have Modulemanager and PRE installed too.

Please help if you know what it could be, Thanks.

Edited October 1, 2022 by Veruscraft
Forgot it
